name: AuditApp_Resources_ChangesForActor
query:
SELECT
  datetime(ru.DateTime, 'localtime') 'Operation DT',
  usr.Name 'Actor',
  rt.Name 'Type',
  ru.ResourceName 'Name',
  op.Name 'Action'
FROM ResourceUpdates AS ru
INNER JOIN ResourceTypes AS rt ON ru.ResourceTypeID = rt.ID
INNER JOIN Sessions AS ses ON ru.SessionID = ses.ID
INNER JOIN Users AS usr ON ses.UserID = usr.ID AND ses.UserID = $Key1
INNER JOIN Operations AS op ON ru.OperationID = op.ID
ORDER BY ru.DateTime DESC
